typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer,
		created as timestamp,
		updated as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlDimCustomer
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlSrcCustomer
AzureSqlSrcCustomer derive(HashKey = sha1(256,age,phone)) ~> HashKey
HashKey, AzureSqlDimCustomer exists(HashKey@HashKey == AzureSqlDimCustomer@HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> RecordExists
RecordExists, AzureSqlDimCustomer lookup(AzureSqlSrcCustomer@id == AzureSqlDimCustomer@id,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LkpCustomer
LkpCustomer derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(created),currentTimestamp(),{created}),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> CreateAuditColumns
CreateAuditColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> Upsert
Upsert sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{} = AzureSqlSrcCustomer@id
	)) ~> AzureSqlTgtTable
